verbs.description: Russians [V: are] benefiting from President Donald Trump 's trade dispute with China while U.S. soybean farmers are suffering from lost sales .
[ARG1: Russians] are [V: benefiting] [ARG0: from President Donald Trump 's trade dispute with China] [ARGM-ADV: while U.S. soybean farmers are suffering from lost sales] .
Russians are benefiting from President Donald Trump 's trade dispute with China while U.S. soybean farmers [V: are] suffering from lost sales .
Russians are benefiting from President Donald Trump 's trade dispute with China while [ARG0: U.S. soybean farmers] are [V: suffering] [ARG1: from lost sales] .
